actions.text: Amendment SA 4233 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.
Amendment SA 4233 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S2083; text: CR S2083) To require that legislation to reauthorize SCHIP include provisions codifying the unborn child regulation.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4233 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4233 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 81.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4233 proposed by Senator Allard.

purpose: To require that legislation to reauthorize SCHIP include provisions codifying the unborn child regulation.
